questions.questionText: Consider a database containing information about courses taken by students. Students have a unique student ID and (possibly not unique) name; courses have a unique course number and (possibly not unique) title; students take a course in a given year and receive a grade. Which of the following schemas would you recommend?

options.option: Took(sID, name, courseNum, title, year, grade)
Course(courseNum, title, year), Took(sID, courseNum, grade)
Student(sID, name), Course(courseNum, title), Took(sID, courseNum, year, grade)
Student(sID, name), Course(courseNum, title), Took(name, title, year, grade)
